resources.string: A White parakeet with a blue chest

Hello, My name is Raul Aquino Escobar 
 - I am a 21 year old man learning about the different types of code 
 - I own two parakeets named Dovah and Pepper Serrano, Pepper is the bird I placed as my me picture 
 - I like listening to classic rock, my favorite song is Tarkus by Eerson, Lake and Palmer 
 - My favorite food is Green Enchiladas
